attributes.action: Ensure that all public sector key workers are paid enough to ensure they can afford to buy a property near their work place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more key workers are finding it impossible to afford to buy their own property because of the government’s strategy on pay awards for civil servants. The key worker sector workforce is something that is an essential part of our society and they should be embraced as a necessity, not seen as a burden.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
